      • run

        public static java.lang.String run(java.io.File wd,
                                   java.lang.String cmd,
                                   java.lang.String... args)
        Runs a command in the wd directory and returns its output. In case of error (exit code different than 0), an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        wd - Directory where to execute the command
        cmd - Command to execute
        args - Command parameters
        Returns:
        Output of the command
